articles.title: What happens to Sean Combs now? - NPR
articles.description: The hip-hop mogul's legal saga has reached an uneasy outcome. Despite a tainted legacy and severed business ties, does his acquittal on the most serious charges leave room for a return?

This report mentions physical and sexual violence.
